flow.name: unseenMessageBPFlow

db:select.db:parameterized-query: SELECT sum(if(ms.status='0',1,0)) as notif FROM messages ms INNER JOIN members m ON ms.member_id=m.id WHERE ms.community_id=#[originalPayload.communityID] AND ms.status='0' AND m.msisdn=#[originalPayload.msisdn] group by ms.community_id

SELECT ms.id, m.msisdn, ms.message, ms.message_date FROM member_community mc INNER JOIN messages ms ON mc.member_id=ms.member_id INNER JOIN members m ON mc.member_id=m.id WHERE ms.community_id=#[originalPayload.communityID] AND ms.status='0' AND (m.msisdn=(SELECT m.msisdn FROM member_community mc INNER JOIN messages ms ON mc.member_id=ms.member_id INNER JOIN members m ON mc.member_id=m.id WHERE mc.community_id=#[originalPayload.communityID] AND mc.admin='1' group by m.msisdn) OR m.msisdn=#[originalPayload.msisdn])
